entry.title: Android
entry.content:
This is my first day learning android, 简单写写android开发环境搭建,个人比较喜欢linux，故讲讲linux下android环境的搭建的方法和一些遇到的问题。。。

 以ubuntu 12.04 为例：

step1 : install java environment and eclipse, just a simple command :

```

$ sudo apt-get install eclipse-jdt

```

step2 : install ADT package :

  open the eclipse and go to Help, click the Install New Software button,then you will see the follow window :

 click the the add button, and set a name follow your love, the location should be set to http://dl-ssl.google.com/android/eclipse/, most of us will be forced to stop with pending table because of the google is blocked. Just run the follow command as root,and you will get a big surprise.

```

echo “74.125.237.1 dl-ssl.google.com” >> /etc/hosts

```

restart the eclipse, and the step2 will be responsed.

step3, install the SDK package

 Go to the Window -> Preferences and locate SDK package, then use the SDK Manager to install the SDK package you need.

 Now, the android develop environment has been builded, Just start to write your programs. Happy beginning!!!

when use the ubuntu 12.04 64-bit system, the AVD may not work, just rename the libOpengRender.so to another name.
